typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateKey as string,
		Date as string,
		DayOfMonth as string,
		DayName as string,
		DayOfWeekUSA as string,
		Day_OfYear as string,
		WeekOfMonth as string,
		WeekOfQuarter as string,
		WeekOfYear as string,
		Month as string,
		MonthName as string,
		Quarter as string,
		QuarterName as string,
		Year as string,
		IsHolidayUSA as string,
		IsWeekday as string,
		HolidayUSA as string,
		FiscalDayOfYear as string,
		FiscalWeekOfYear as string,
		FiscalMonth as string,
		FiscalQuarter as string,
		FiscalQuarterName as string,
		FiscalYear as string,
		FiscalYearName as string,
		FiscalMonthYear as string,
		FiscalMMYYYY as string,
		FiscalFirstDayOfMonth as string,
		FiscalLastDayOfMonth as string,
		FiscalFirstDayOfQuarter as string,
		FiscalLastDayOfQuarter as string,
		FiscalFirstDayOfYear as string,
		FiscalLastDayOfYear as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	multiLineRow: true) ~> source
source select(mapColumn(
		DateKey,
		Dates = Date,
		DayOfMonth,
		DayNames = DayName,
		DayOfWeekUSA,
		DayOfYears = Day_OfYear,
		WeekOfMonth,
		WeekOfQuarter,
		WeekOfYear,
		Month,
		MonthName,
		Quarter,
		QuarterName,
		Year,
		IsHolidayUSA,
		IsWeekday,
		HolidayUSA,
		FiscalDayOfYear,
		FiscalWeekOfYear,
		FiscalMonth,
		FiscalQuarter,
		FiscalQuarterName,
		FiscalYear,
		FiscalYearName,
		FiscalMonthYear,
		FiscalMMYYYY,
		FiscalFirstDayOfMonth,
		FiscalLastDayOfMonth,
		FiscalFirstDayOfQuarter,
		FiscalLastDayOfQuarter,
		FiscalFirstDayOfYear,
		FiscalLastDayOfYear
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Select sink(input(
		DateKey as string,
		Date as string,
		DayOfMonth as string,
		DayName as string,
		DayOfWeekUSA as string,
		Day_OfYear as string,
		WeekOfMonth as string,
		WeekOfQuarter as string,
		WeekOfYear as string,
		Month as string,
		MonthName as string,
		Quarter as string,
		QuarterName as string,
		Year as string,
		IsHolidayUSA as string,
		IsWeekday as string,
		HolidayUSA as string,
		FiscalDayOfYear as string,
		FiscalWeekOfYear as string,
		FiscalMonth as string,
		FiscalQuarter as string,
		FiscalQuarterName as string,
		FiscalYear as string,
		FiscalYearName as string,
		FiscalMonthYear as string,
		FiscalMMYYYY as string,
		FiscalFirstDayOfMonth as string,
		FiscalLastDayOfMonth as string,
		FiscalFirstDayOfQuarter as string,
		FiscalLastDayOfQuarter as string,
		FiscalFirstDayOfYear as string,
		FiscalLastDayOfYear as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DimDate.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink
